Module com.example.navalbattle
Package com.example.navalbattle.interfaces

Interface GameModelInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameModel
public interface GameModelInterface
Interface that defines the core methods for managing the game state and persistence in the Naval Battle game. Provides methods for creating a new match, loading and saving game states, and removing match tracking.

  • Method Details

    • getNickname

      String getNickname()
      Retrieves the player's nickname.
      Returns:
      the nickname of the player

    • getMainTable

      MainTable getMainTable()
      Retrieves the main table of the machine.
      Returns:
      the main table of the machine

    • getPositionTable

      PositionTable getPositionTable()
      Retrieves the position table of the player.
      Returns:
      the position table of the player

    • existsPreviousMatch

      boolean existsPreviousMatch(String nickname)
      Checks if there is a previous match saved for the given nickname. If a previous match is found, it loads the match; otherwise, creates a new match.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      Returns:
      true if a previous match exists, false otherwise

    • newMatch

      void newMatch(String nickname)
      Creates a new match by initializing new position and main tables, then registers the new match in persistence.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player

    • loadPreviousMatch

      void loadPreviousMatch()
      Loads the previous match from persistent storage. This method restores the match's state by assigning the player's nickname, position table, and main table.

    • previousMatch

      MatchStatusSerializable previousMatch() throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      Loads the previous match state from persistent storage. This method allows the game to resume from the last saved state.
      Returns:
      the deserialized MatchStatusSerializable containing the previous game state
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the class of a serialized object cannot be found
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the saved file

    • saveGame

      void saveGame()
      Saves the current game state to persistent storage. This method takes a snapshot of the current position and main tables and saves it.

    • removeMatchTracking

      void removeMatchTracking()
      Removes the tracking of the current match by deleting the saved match state. This will remove any persistent data related to the match.
